items.name: Pokemon Tower Defense Two Wiki
items.title: Pokemon Tower Defense Two Wiki
items.headline: Come to Pokemon Tower Defense 2 Wiki!
items.desc: Pokémon fans are incredibly passionate about the game, the success of which has resulted in a long-running main series and countless spin-off titles spanning over a decade. Similarly, the tower defense genre is comparable in its popularity and the number of fans that it has around the world. Although these two very different styles of game initially seem incompatible, "Sam and Dan Games" managed to bring a very successful marriage of the two, designing the extremely addictive and incredibly popular series of Pokémon Tower Defense 2. The response was overwhelmingly positive that this sequel is put forward over PTD1's success. Pokémon Tower Defense 2 is arguably the best realisation of browser-based Pokémon action in existence, and is a heavy-hitter in the competitive realm of the tower defense games.
